body_html:
Update on this issue:

When I create the model ``, I get the warning:

WARNING:tensorflow:Using temporary folder as model directory: /var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z

And when I look in that folder I find the following files/folders:

  • checkpoint
  • eval
  • events.out.tfevents.1471375449.ip-192-168-100-142.ec2.internal
  • graph.pbtxt
  • model.ckpt-100-00000-of-00001
  • model.ckpt-100.meta

And so if I try and run skflow.TensorFlowEstimator.restore('/var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z'), if get the error:


---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-73-128bb2217974> in <module>()
----> 1 skflow.TensorFlowEstimator.restore('/var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z')

/Users/brad/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/base.pyc in restore(cls, path, config)
    324     model_def_filename = os.path.join(path, 'model.def')
    325     if not os.path.exists(model_def_filename):
--> 326       raise ValueError("Restore folder doesn't contain model definition.")
    327     # list of parameters that are allowed to be reconfigured
    328     reconfigurable_params = ['_config']

ValueError: Restore folder doesn't contain model definition.

So it looks like there is a model in there, but it's not recognizing it.

body:
Update on this issue:

When I create the model ``, I get the warning:

```
WARNING:tensorflow:Using temporary folder as model directory: /var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z
```

And when I look in that folder I find the following files/folders:
- `checkpoint`
- `eval`
- `events.out.tfevents.1471375449.ip-192-168-100-142.ec2.internal`
- `graph.pbtxt`
- `model.ckpt-100-00000-of-00001`
- `model.ckpt-100.meta`

And so if I try and run `skflow.TensorFlowEstimator.restore('/var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z')`, if get the error:

```

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-73-128bb2217974> in <module>()
----> 1 skflow.TensorFlowEstimator.restore('/var/folders/k7/x_ddt3gn57z7x452wglt9brh0000gn/T/tmpM2yh_z')

/Users/brad/anaconda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/contrib/learn/python/learn/estimators/base.pyc in restore(cls, path, config)
    324     model_def_filename = os.path.join(path, 'model.def')
    325     if not os.path.exists(model_def_filename):
--> 326       raise ValueError("Restore folder doesn't contain model definition.")
    327     # list of parameters that are allowed to be reconfigured
    328     reconfigurable_params = ['_config']

ValueError: Restore folder doesn't contain model definition.
```

So it looks like there is a model in there, but it's not recognizing it.
